summary: Stronghold Digital Mining filed an amendment to a prospectus.
title: IGNORE: Stronghold Digital Mining share sale previously reported
content: An earlier story on Stronghold Digital Mining concerned a share sale that was previously reported. Today's filing was an amendment to the original prospectus filed in September.
